sensory_systems.name: Advanced Dough Rheology Sensor
sensory_systems.description: A multi-modal sensor array capable of continuously measuring dough properties in real-time: hydration, gluten development, extensibility, elasticity, and internal temperature. Uses a combination of shear stress sensors, extensometers, and infrared temperature probes.
sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: High-frequency, continuous monitoring with temporal resolution of 1 Hz

sensory_systems.name: Volatile Organic Compound (VOC) Analyzer
sensory_systems.description: A miniaturized, hyperspectral VOC sensor array to detect and quantify aroma compounds released during fermentation and baking, enabling real-time flavor profiling.

technical_specifications.detection_range: 10-1000 ppm for key aroma compounds (e.g., esters, aldehydes)

sensory_systems.name: Visual Inspection System (AI-powered)
sensory_systems.description: High-resolution 3D camera system combined with deep learning algorithms for automated visual inspection of crust color, crumb structure, and overall appearance.
sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: Real-time analysis with 1 Hz temporal resolution.

control_systems.name: Model Predictive Control (MPC) System
control_systems.description: A sophisticated MPC system integrating data from all sensory systems to dynamically adjust mixing parameters (speed, ingredient addition rates), oven temperature, and baking time in real-time.
control_systems.accuracy_metrics: Consistent crumb structure and crust color within specified tolerances.

control_systems.name: Dynamic Temperature Mapping Oven
control_systems.description: An oven utilizing localized heating zones controlled by individual PID controllers, capable of maintaining highly uniform temperature gradients across the baking chamber.
control_systems.accuracy_metrics: Consistent baking performance across all bread types.

mechanical_systems.name: Adaptive Mixing System
mechanical_systems.description: A mixing system with variable-speed motors, adjustable ingredient dispensers, and a flexible mixing chamber to optimize dough development.
mechanical_systems.accuracy_metrics: Uniform dough composition and gluten development.

mechanical_systems.name: Precision Ingredient Delivery System
mechanical_systems.description: Automated dispensers for precise addition of flour, water, yeast, and other ingredients, controlled by the MPC system.

software_integration.name: Digital Twin Breadmaking Platform
software_integration.description: A software platform integrating all sensor data, control algorithms, and process models to simulate and optimize the entire breadmaking process.

technical_specifications.API integration: Open APIs for interfacing with other systems

software_integration.accuracy_metrics: Improved baking consistency and reduced waste.

software_integration.name: Reinforcement Learning Algorithm
software_integration.description: A machine learning model trained using the Digital Twin to continuously refine the MPC control strategy based on historical data and real-time feedback.
